title: Italy Tranquil Quarto d'Altino Escape just 25 Minutes from Venice
description: Set away from Venice's bustling streets, but with easy access to public transport, Crowne Plaza Venice East - Quarto d'Altino, an IHG Hotel is an urban oasis providing peace and tranquillity. Invigorate your body and mind at the onsite fitness centre or savour delicious Italian cuisine at Il Campiello restaurant before spending your evening with good company and a cool cocktail at the onsite bar. Then, head to the trian station opposite the hotel to experience vibrant Venice after dark.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Venice East - Quarto d'Altino, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Viale Della Resistenza, 18/20, Quarto d'Altino, VE 30020, Italy
